Suite.Title: DataForSeo

RestConnector.Title: Google Results
RestConnector.HelpText: Receive SERP (Top 100) results from Google according to a certain keyword.

RestConnector.Title: Bing Results
RestConnector.HelpText: Receive SERP (Top 100) results from Bing according to a certain keyword.

RestConnector.Title: Yahoo Results
RestConnector.HelpText: Receive SERP (Top 100) results from Yahoo according to a certain keyword.

RestConnector.Title: Search Volume
RestConnector.HelpText: Receive search statistics for one or more keywords

Checkbox.Title: Google Search Partners
Checkbox.HelpText: If true, the results will be delivered for Google and search partners.

RestConnector.Title: Search Volume Monthly
RestConnector.HelpText: Receive search volume trends for the last year.

Checkbox.Title: Google Search Partners
Checkbox.HelpText: If true, the results will be delivered for Google and search partners.

RestConnector.Title: Keywords for Domain
RestConnector.HelpText: Receive keyword statistics for one domain.

RestConnector.Title: Keywords for Domain Monthly
RestConnector.HelpText: Receive keyword statistics for one domain for the last year.

RestConnector.Title: Keywords for Keywords
RestConnector.HelpText: Receive keyword suggestions for one or more keywords.

Checkbox.Title: Google Search Partners
Checkbox.HelpText: If true, the results will be delivered for Google and search partners.

RestConnector.Title: Keywords for Keywords Monthly
RestConnector.HelpText: Receive keyword suggestions for one or more keywords for the last year.

Checkbox.Title: Google Search Partners
Checkbox.HelpText: If true, the results will be delivered for Google and search partners.

RestConnector.Title: Keywords for Categories
RestConnector.HelpText: Receive keyword for one product category.

Checkbox.Title: Google Search Partners
Checkbox.HelpText: If true, the results will be delivered for Google and search partners.

RestConnector.Title: Keywords for Categories Monthly
RestConnector.HelpText: Receive keyword for one product category for the last year.

Checkbox.Title: Google Search Partners
Checkbox.HelpText: If true, the results will be delivered for Google and search partners.

RestConnector.Title: Ads Traffic for Keywords
RestConnector.HelpText: Receive Ads stats for daily impressions, CPC and clicks estimation.

Number.Title: Bid
Number.HelpText: The price you are willing to pay for an ad; the higher value you specify, the higher positions and price you will get.

RestConnector.Title: Ads Traffic by Platforms
RestConnector.HelpText: Receive Ads stats based on one platform. You will get overall information for a group of keywords you send.

Number.Title: Bid
Number.HelpText: The price you are willing to pay for an ad; the higher value you specify, the higher positions and price you will get.

RestConnector.Title: Related Keywords
RestConnector.HelpText: Get keywords that are related to a keyword you are going to provide.

Text.Title: Filter
Text.HelpText: Click this icon to see example filters, ie: ["keyword_data.keyword_info.search_volume",">",0]

RestConnector.Title: Keyword Suggestions
RestConnector.HelpText: Based on the full-text search for the specified keyword. Returns only those search terms that contain the keyword you requested with additional words before, after, or within the specified key phrase.

Text.Title: Filter
Text.HelpText: Click this icon to see example filters, ie: ["keyword_info.search_volume",">",0]

RestConnector.Title: Ranked Keywords
RestConnector.HelpText: Get keywords for which a website is ranked.

Text.Title: Filter
Text.HelpText: Click this icon to see example filters, ie: ["ranked_serp_element.serp_item.rank_group","<=",10]

RestConnector.Title: Relevant Pages
RestConnector.HelpText: Get SERP metrics for relevant pages of a website based on a specific location.

Text.Title: Filter
Text.HelpText: Click this icon to see example filters, ie: ["metrics.paid.count",">",0]

RestConnector.Title: Subdomains
RestConnector.HelpText: Provides you with a list of subdomains of the specified domain, along with the ranking distribution across organic and paid search.

Text.Title: Filter
Text.HelpText: Click this icon to see example filters, ie: ["metrics.paid.count",">",0]

RestConnector.Title: Keyword Ideas
RestConnector.HelpText: Provides search terms that are relevant to the product or service categories of the specified keywords.

Text.Title: Filter
Text.HelpText: Click this icon to see example filters, ie: ["keyword_info.search_volume",">",0]

Checkbox.Title: Closely Variants
Checkbox.HelpText: If set to true the results will be based on the phrase-match search algorithm, otherwise based on the broad-match search algorithm.
